definition: Han Chinese person or people
man
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]

sentences.english: Therefore, a Han Chinese Mid-Autumn Festival subsequently overturned the anniversary of Mongolian rule predecessors.
sentences.chinese: 因此，中秋节也是推翻蒙古人统治的汉人纪念活动。

sentences.english: They express great dissatisfaction. Now some of them refer to Chinese people in a derogatory manner.
sentences.chinese: 他们都很不满，提到汉人，有些人用了贬损的态度。

sentences.english: The criminals, no matter they are Muslim Uygur or Han Chinese should be put in the prison.
sentences.chinese: 罪犯，不管他们是维人或汉人都应进监狱。

sentences.english: "The Uyghurs will attack any Han they see, " one man said.
sentences.chinese: 维吾尔人会攻击他们遇到的任何汉人，一个人说。

sentences.english: Yue and Hakka are both part of modern Han.
sentences.chinese: 越人和客家人都是现代汉人的族群之一。

sentences.english: We moslems also have chinese blood in us .
sentences.chinese: 我们回民中间也有汉人的血统。

sentences.english: As Tibetans they feel some kind of subtle discrimination by the Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 身为藏人，他们感受到汉人某种难以形容的歧视。

sentences.english: As the major one, the Han people make up 93% of all Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 作为中国的主体民族，汉人占了全中国人口的93%。

sentences.english: Chaoshan if this is the ancient Chinese language in the Central Plains to wave a product of evolution.
sentences.chinese: 潮汕话本是古代中原汉人语言在潮地衍变的产物。
中国纯种汉人已经绝迹。

sentences.english: The most famous classical ones we read now are mainly texts of Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 传世的“群经诸子”，主要是汉人的文本。

sentences.english: Still they wore their hair plaited in a queue just like all other Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 但是回回仍然像其他汉人一样留着辫子。

sentences.english: Together they had then not only fought non-Muslim Chinese but they had also massacred entire communities.
sentences.chinese: 他们不仅一起与非穆斯林汉人作战，也杀其他族的人。

sentences.english: Han Chinese nowadays usually wear Western-style clothing.
sentences.chinese: 中国汉人如今常穿西洋式服装。

definition: Mongol
ethnic groups in the north and west of China in ancient times/foreigner/barbarian
Qidan or Khitan, ethnic group in ancient China, a branch of the Eastern Hu people inhabiting the valley of the Xar Murun River in the upper reaches of the Liao River 遼河|辽河[Liao2 He2]
Mongolia
Jurchen, a Tungus ethnic group, predecessor of the Manchu ethnic group who founded the Later Jin Dynasty 後金|后金[Hou4 Jin1] and Qing Dynasty
common term for non-Han peoples in former times, not exclusively derogatory/barbarian
Tatar (person)
Turkic ethnic group
a Manchu
Tangut branch of the Qiang 羌 ethnic group/ancient ethnic group who made up the Xixia dynasty 西夏 1038-1227
Manchurian Qing (refers to the Qing dynasty, esp. at its decline, or as an anti-Qing slogan)
Huihu, Tang dynasty name of ethnic group corresponding to modern Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]
Xianbei or Xianbi, group of northern nomadic peoples
Tartar (various northern tribes in ancient China)/Tatar (Turkic ethnic group in central Asia)
Eight Banners, military organization of Manchu later Jin dynasty 後金|后金[Hou4 Jin1] from c. 1600, subsequently of the Qing dynasty
Huihe, pre-Tang name of ethnic group corresponding to modern Uighur
